In the Academia's library, vast as the deep sea,
There's barely any documentation about tools to be found,
Even though mattocks are common... how mysterious~

The mattock is a multi-purpose tool invented
to save on backpack space while out exploring.
Not only can it harvest wood, but it can also mine minerals.
